1900950.book: Stating That Rasoolullah Wore The Ring On His Right Hand
1900950.reference:
Reference  : Shama'il Muhammadiyah 1900950
In-book reference  : Book 12, Hadith 001
English translation  : Vol. 1, Book 12, Hadith 001
1900950.text: 'Ali ibn Abi Talib said (may Allah be well pleased with him): “The Prophet (Allah bless him and give him peace) used to wear his signet ring on his right hand.”

1900970.book: Stating That Rasoolullah Wore The Ring On His Right Hand
1900970.reference:
Reference  : Shama'il Muhammadiyah 1900970
In-book reference  : Book 12, Hadith 002
English translation  : Vol. 1, Book 12, Hadith 002
1900970.text: Hammad ibn Salama said: "I saw Ibn Abi Rafi' wearing a signet ring on his right hand, so I asked him about that and he said: 'I saw 'Abdu llah ibn Ja'far wearing a signet ring on his right hand', and 'Abdullah ibn Ja'far said: 'Allah’s Messenger (Allah bless him and give him peace) used to wear a signet ring on his right hand'.”

1900980.book: Stating That Rasoolullah Wore The Ring On His Right Hand
1900980.reference:
Reference  : Shama'il Muhammadiyah 1900980
In-book reference  : Book 12, Hadith 003
English translation  : Vol. 1, Book 12, Hadith 003
1900980.text: Abdullah ibn Ja'far said: “He (Allah bless him and give him peace) used to wear a signet ring on his right hand.”

1900990.book: Stating That Rasoolullah Wore The Ring On His Right Hand
1900990.reference:
Reference  : Shama'il Muhammadiyah 1900990
In-book reference  : Book 12, Hadith 004
English translation  : Vol. 1, Book 12, Hadith 004
1900990.text: Jabir ibn ‘Abdi’llah said: "The Prophet (Allah bless him and give him peace) used to wear a signet ring on his right hand.”

1901000.book: Stating That Rasoolullah Wore The Ring On His Right Hand
1901000.reference:
Reference  : Shama'il Muhammadiyah 1901000
In-book reference  : Book 12, Hadith 005
English translation  : Vol. 1, Book 12, Hadith 005
1901000.text: ‘As-Salt ibn 'Abdi’llah said: “Ibn 'Abbas used to wear a signet ring on his right hand, without adornment, and he said: 'Allah’s Messenger (Allah bless him and give him peace) used to wear a signet ring on his right hand'.”

1901010.book: Stating That Rasoolullah Wore The Ring On His Right Hand
1901010.reference:
Reference  : Shama'il Muhammadiyah 1901010
In-book reference  : Book 12, Hadith 006
English translation  : Vol. 1, Book 12, Hadith 006
1901010.text: Ibn 'Umar said: "The Prophet (Allah bless him and give him peace) chose a signet ring of silver, and put its stone in the part close to the palm of his hand. On it he engraved: “Muhammad is the Messenger of Allah,” and he forbade anyone [else] to engrave on it. It is the one that fell from Mu'aiqib into the well of Aris.”

1901020.book: Stating That Rasoolullah Wore The Ring On His Right Hand
1901020.reference:
Reference  : Shama'il Muhammadiyah 1901020
In-book reference  : Book 12, Hadith 007
English translation  : Vol. 1, Book 12, Hadith 007
1901020.text: Ja'far ibn Muhammad reports that his father said: "Al-Hasan and al-Husain used to wear signet rings on their left hands."

1901030.book: Stating That Rasoolullah Wore The Ring On His Right Hand
1901030.reference:
Reference  : Shama'il Muhammadiyah 1901030
In-book reference  : Book 12, Hadith 008
English translation  : Vol. 1, Book 12, Hadith 008
1901030.text: Anas ibn Malik said: “He (Allah bless him and give him peace) used to wear a signet ring on his right hand.”

1901040.book: Stating That Rasoolullah Wore The Ring On His Right Hand
1901040.reference:
Reference  : Shama'il Muhammadiyah 1901040
In-book reference  : Book 12, Hadith 009
English translation  : Vol. 1, Book 12, Hadith 009
1901040.text: Ibn 'Umar said: "Allah’s Messenger (Allah bless him and give him peace) chose a signet ring of gold, and he used to wear it on his right hand. The people therefore chose signet rings of gold, so he threw it away (Allah bless him and give him peace) and said: 'I shall never wear it!' The people therefore threw their signet rings away.”
